customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
Where we last left off, the heroes had heard that there were demons causing trouble here, and yet when they found them, these "demons" turned out to be two Fatui...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: Your Support Zone starts with 1 "Iron Tongue Tian" card.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Agente dei Fatui di Pyro
customize.desc:
Agente Lama del regolamento

"Non si scappa dai debiti, che si sia vivi o altrimenti"

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Tian Lingua di ferro
customize.desc:
"Where We Last Left Off" Iron Tongue Tian

"Listen, I'll tell you how is it… Let me show you real storytelling tradition!”

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
As the saying goes, you must see many things before your eyes can truly be opened. After watching some of his audience playing the card game everyday, Iron Tongue Tian now has a decent understanding of the game's rules...
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Rhodeia di Loch
customize.desc:
"Lady of Clear Waters" Rhodeia

"As long as rain falls and rivers flow… water will exist forever…"

customize.name: Xiangling
customize.desc:
Xiangling, Maestra culinaria di Liyue

In quanto chef, è praticamente onnipotente.

customize.name: Fischl
customize.desc:
"Fischl, Prinzessin der Verurteilung!" Fischl

"Oz, mio figlio, distendi le tue ali e tessimi un nuovo destino nell'oscurità della notte!"

"Mein Fräulein, non possono aiutarla a sostituire una carta..."
